title: teachingSessionMetadata
description: Schema for storing metadata about a Teaching Session in Yogis

sessionId.description: Unique identifier for this teaching session

userId.description: Reference to the user (Firebase UID) running the session

planId.description: Reference to the ClassPlan being taught

startedAt.description: Timestamp (ms since epoch) when the session began

endedAt.description: Timestamp when the session ended (null until finished)

currentElementOrder.description: Index/order of the pose or flow the user is currently on (0â€‘based)
